analysis.description: Oraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/31/0x162774441fb7f8a1bde335dc7f5accd51aac0d91.sol#282-291) is declared view but contains assembly code

Oraclize.cbAddress uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- cbAddresses[tx.origin] != 0 (/unique_chucks/31/0x162774441fb7f8a1bde335dc7f5accd51aac0d91.sol#77-80)

Oraclize.getPrice uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- (offchainPayment[_addr]) || ((_gaslimit <= 200000) && (reqc[_addr] == 0) && (gasprice_ <= gasprice) && (tx.origin != cbAddress())) (/unique_chucks/31/0x162774441fb7f8a1bde335dc7f5accd51aac0d91.sol#261-272)
